comment: I took Dr. Powers for 1152 Lab and she was pretty easy as far as grading goes. The only hard part was the final, which is the only reason I made a B. I would recommend taking her. Pretty easy lab.
She does not know how to teach... Enough said!
"Things like, that kinds of thing, this kinds of thing, things" are what you hear the most in her class! If you really want to learn, don't take her.
Dr. Powers is an excellent Biochemistry teacher.  She explains everything in a very concise way and she enjoys teaching.  If you want to learn a lot about Biochemistry I urge you to take her!!!!
she is nice person, but she skips a lot.  Her test are very detailed.  online quiz are not hard but it has nothing to do with test. she doesn't curve.

I took Pharm form her. She is a GREAT teacher. Really knows her stuff, You really have to study but welcome to the REAL world. People don't like her because she expects you to know the material and they just want to pass. If you want to learn then take her, If not get a job at Mc Donalds

I almost did not take Dr. Powers because of all the bad reviews. She's just not one of the "favorites" on campus. Her test come directly from her lectures...NO surprises come exam time. Online quizzes come more from the book. She is not an easy professor but she is fair. You will have to work hard for your grade.

Her lectures are extremely varied she jumps from one subject to the next like you already know it-not very streamlined in the way she teaches.The online quizzes are completely different from the tests.Tests are extremely detailed;lots of drawing out reactions.Does not curve even if class average is failing.I had to outline the book to do decently

Her class is boring but her tests are nothing like the way she teaches- much harder. Chapterly online quizzes are helpful, but it is really hard to do well without spending a good amount of time studying. Be prepared.

Dr. Powers is one of the best teachers I've ever hard. Granted, I didn't do well in her class, however she helped me as much as I could. Friendliest professor I've ever met. Not sure what the dumbasses below are saying. I didn't do well in her class, but that was due to my fault, not hers. I would highly recommend her for a class. Good luck!

Oh shes terrible, ssoooooooo TERRIBLE! Not a people person. Tends to be moody. I agree with just about everything all the past posts said. Tests COMPLETELY DIFFERENT from what she teaches!!! Vague in her teaching but EXTREMELY detailed (and picky) on her tests! Good luck getting a B regardless of how much or how hard you may think you study.

lil care for students.Very introverted,prefers males over females.u ask questions & gives blank stares like ur stupid.tests are crazy.says tests over main ideas,but are detailed in reality!Doesnt understand low class avg are reflection on her & not just students,does not know how to test students.takes off for everything!she needs sum luvin.run!!!!

ruunnnn......away from this professor!! Her tests are ridiculously hard (makes you wonder if she uses a different book....mmm). But then again, not many option for biochemistry professors, so you would probably have to take her or Dr. Duda, which is no matter. Well, good luck :)

I feel that she graded tests fairly.  Her powerpoint notes SUCK!  If she had better notes, it might help me to understand things a little better, because the textbook is really poorly written.  She took the time to tutor me on several occasions.  Stuck up?  Maybe slightly, but overall an OK person.
not enough tests, tests are too hard and cover too much material. also she is very stuck up
